quoteText: You may also be invited or required to provide information about you, including, for example, demographic information, such as occupation, and research vita, education, authorship of articles, academic or research expertise or interests, conferences you have attended, groups of which you are a member, information regarding your professional and academic career, academic degree, your previous roles and jobs.
title: The service collects many different types of personal data

tosdr.case: The service collects many different types of personal data
tosdr.tldr: Users may be required to provide demographic information, which includes gender, birthday, occupation and age.
